channel.title: Vishal Kotha | Materials Scientist on Dr. Vishal Kotha | Materials Scientist
channel.description: Recent content in Vishal Kotha | Materials Scientist on Dr. Vishal Kotha | Materials Scientist

item.title: Multifunctional Perovskites: From Batteries to Green Pharma
item.description: Tailoring K-substituted $LaMnO_3$ for high-stability Zinc-Air batteries and selective organocatalysis.

item.title: Green Hydrogen & Nanodevice Fabrication
item.description: From Chiral Ni-Au catalysts to Single Nanorod devices: Bridging synthesis with device engineering.

item.title: Photocatalysis: Chemically Hard Doping in ZnO
item.description: Enhancing dye degradation efficiency by 91% using Al-doped ZnO nanostructures.

item.title: Computational Materials Science: Boron Carbide
item.description: Ab-initio DFT calculations on the failure mechanisms of bulletproof armor.

item.title: About Dr. Vishal Kotha
item.description:
I am a Materials Scientist and Data Engineer dedicated to bridging the gap between atomic-level design and real-world energy applications. With a Ph.D. from IIT Bombay and postdoctoral experience at the Weizmann Institute of Science, I specialize in synthesizing transition metal perovskite oxides for green hydrogen and next-gen batteries.

My Philosophy: “Conscious Science”

My approach to research is grounded in the belief that precision in the laboratory begins with precision of the mind.

item.title: Let's Collaborate
item.description:
Open for Innovation

I am currently open to roles in R&D, Battery Technology, and Semiconductor Manufacturing.

Contact Details

  • üìß vishalkotha1@gmail.com
  • üëî LinkedIn Profile
  • üìç Mumbai, India

Research Profiles

Google Scholar ‚Üó ORCID ‚Üó

Download Full Resume

item.title: Life in Science
item.description:
Science is not just about data; it is about people, teaching, and exploration.

Invited Speaker
Delivering a lecture on "Future Materials" to PG students at Khallikote Unitary University (KUU).
Science Communication
Demonstrating "Chemistry Magic" to the public at IIT Bombay Techfest.
Conference Organization
Organizing committee member for the APCTCC-8 Conference at IIT Bombay.
Mentorship
Guiding a Master's student during their poster presentation.
Technical Leadership
Leading the installation of a ZEISS SEM system.
Global Research
Beginning my Postdoctoral journey at Weizmann Institute, Israel.
Doctoral Convocation
Receiving Ph.D. degree from Prof. M. Ravikanth (HOD Chemistry, IITB).
Roots
Department of Chemistry, Pondicherry University.

item.title: Technical Capabilities
item.description:
My expertise spans the full materials lifecycle, bridging computational design with experimental realization.

üî¨ Instrumentation Proficiency

Microscopy

FEG-TEM & HR-TEM

500+ hours. Data Shown: Atomic resolution IFFT analysis of lattice fringes.

Spectroscopy

XPS (ESCA) & EDS

<title>Dr. Vishal Kotha | Materials Chemist | PhD (IIT-Bombay) | Postdoc (WIS-Weizmann)</title>
  <meta name="description" content="Explore Dr. Vishal Kotha's research portfolio, known as 'nano-inn', a culmination of scientific endeavors from his Masters at Pondicherry University to his doctoral and postdoctoral journey at IIT-Bombay and WIS-Weizmann, Israel. Delve into a rich tapestry of scientific and non-scientific achievements, showcasing a commitment to advancing knowledge and innovation in materials chemistry.">

<script id="wix-first-paint">
    if (window.ResizeObserver &&
        (!window.PerformanceObserver || !PerformanceObserver.supportedEntryTypes || PerformanceObserver.supportedEntryTypes.indexOf('paint') === -1)) {
        new ResizeObserver(function (entries, observer) {
            entries.some(function (entry) {
                var contentRect = entry.contentRect;
                if (contentRect.width > 0 && contentRect.height > 0) {
                    requestAnimationFrame(function (now) {
                        window.wixFirstPaint = now;
                        dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent('wixFirstPaint'));
                    });
                    observer.disconnect();
                    return true;
                }
            });
        }).observe(document.body);
    }
</script>


<script id="scroll-bar-width-calculation">
    const div = document.createElement('div')
    div.style.overflowY = 'scroll'
    div.style.width = '50px'
    div.style.height = '50px'
    div.style.visibility = 'hidden'
    document.body.appendChild(div)
    const scrollbarWidth= div.offsetWidth - div.clientWidth
    document.body.removeChild(div)
    if(scrollbarWidth > 0){
        document.body.style.setProperty('--scrollbar-width', `${scrollbarWidth}px`)
    }
</script>

title: “Professional Experience” date: 2025-12-03Postdoctoral Fellow | Weizmann Institute of ScienceRehovot, Israel | 2023 ‚Äì 2024Chiral Catalysis: Pioneered chirality induction in Ni-Au systems for the Hydrogen Evolution Reaction (HER). Achieved a 10% efficiency improvement for green fuel applications.1Advanced Characterization: Utilized TEM and XPS to correlate structural chirality with catalytic activity.Collaboration: Worked with international, multidisciplinary teams to demonstrate superior HER activity.Postdoctoral Fellow | IIT BombayMumbai, India | 2022 ‚Äì 2023Magneto-Electric Effects: Investigated water electrolysis using $La_2FeMnO_6$, advancing multi-ferroic catalysts.1Mechanochemistry: Conducted shear-induced nucleation and exfoliation of nanomaterials for scalable synthesis.Ph.D. Researcher | IIT BombayMumbai, India | 2016 ‚Äì 2022Thesis: Tailoring Transition Metal Perovskite Oxides via Low-Temperature Hydrothermal Routes.Key Achievement: Led hydrothermal synthesis of K-substituted $LaMnO_3$ perovskite for zinc-air batteries, resulting in 3 high-impact publications.1Mentorship: Trained 4 students and logged 500+ hours on characterization tools (FEG-TEM, SEM).Insight: Note the use of LaTeX syntax $La_2FeMnO_6$ for chemical formulas. Hugo can render this using MathJax if enabled in the theme config, allowing for professional scientific notation essential for a chemist.

title: “Publications"My research has resulted in 11 peer-reviewed articles in high-impact journals.Selected PublicationsNishad, H. S., Kotha, V., et al. (2024). Exchanging interlayer anions in NiFe-LDHs nanosphere enables superior battery-type storage for high-rate aqueous hybrid supercapacitors. J. Mater. Chem. A, 12(16), 9494-9507.(https://doi.org/10.1039/D4TA00299G) 1Gupta, S. P., Kotha, V., et al. (2024). Hydrated $WO_3 \cdot 0.33H_2O$ nanorod for excellent anode materials… J. Power Sources, 604, 234500.(https://doi.org/10.1016/j.jpowsour.2024.234500) 1Kotha, V.*, Karajagi, I., et al. (2022). Potassium-substituted $LaMnO_3$ as a highly active and exceptionally stable electrocatalyst… ACS Appl. Energy Mater., 5(6), 7297-7307.(https://doi.org/10.1021/acsaem.2c00823) 1In PreparationTitleTarget JournalStatusChiral-induced spin selectivity in electrochemical synthesisACS Energy FuelsWritingTemporally separated crystallization events in perovskite oxidesNanoscaleAnalysisFormatting Insight: We used a Markdown Table for the “In Preparation” papers. Tables are excellent for concise status updates. The syntax | :— | defines a left-aligned column.
